items.summary: Show the top header navigation bar only for authenticated (Internet Identity) sessions; do not render the header on the unauthenticated login screen or during guest sessions.

Update the authenticated header UI to match the provided SafeSpace spec: a solid white strip across the top; left-aligned SafeSpace circular heart logo and 'SafeSpace' wordmark; centered nav items with 'Home' styled as a purple pill with a heart icon; other nav items shown as black icons + black text ('AI Companion', 'Mood Tracker', 'My History'); right-aligned purple circular profile icon and purple circular alien/robot icon, plus an outlined Logout button with an exit/arrow icon and black text/border.

Render the header center navigation items as visual placeholders only (non-navigating): clicking them must not change the current page or route; keep existing in-app navigation mechanisms elsewhere (e.g., dashboard cards) unchanged.

Implement the SafeSpace aurora background using CSS gradients/effects (no generated background image): a vibrant deep abstract background with diagonal, aurora-like light streaks in violet, magenta, purple, and electric cyan; include soft blooms/luminous patches and subtle motion.

Ensure the unauthenticated login experience matches the described central glassmorphism card layout: centered frosted/translucent white card with a soft outer glow; top logo; heading 'Welcome to SafeSpace' in bold purple; subheading 'Your personal mental wellness companion' in smaller black/gray; primary gradient button 'Login with Internet Identity' with sparkle icon; 'OR' divider; secondary 'Continue as Guest' button with glowing purple outline; and a Terms of Service + Privacy Policy agreement checkbox.
Add the specified corner accent element to the login screen: a partially visible, translucent purple circular icon with a user silhouette in the bottom-left corner (purely decorative).

Ensure SafeSpace logo assets are present and used as static frontend assets (no backend serving): use the existing generated image files referenced by the BrandLogo component under frontend/public/assets/generated.
